headline: Assessing Xylem (XYL) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Xylem (XYL) has drawn fresh attention after recent share performance, with a 1 day return of about a 1.8% decline and a past 3 months return near a 7.9% decline challenging longer term gains. See our latest analysis for Xylem. The recent 1 day and 30 day share price declines, alongside a 90 day share price return of a 7.9% decline, sit against a more resilient backdrop, with 1 year total shareholder return roughly flat and 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns of 29.25% and 37.07%...
